content: designed after the popular wildlife animal the crochet sloth hat is sure to be a hit with the kids worked up with easy stitches such as double_crochet as well as simple seaming stitch along to watch this cute creature come to life made in bernat super value a versatile worsted weight yarn that comes in an economically sized skein so you can make lots of crochet sloth hats with fewer balls of yarn bernat super value is also machine washable and dryable perfect for kids accessories
